title: Apple Inc. 2023 Form 10-K
content: Apple reported double-digit services growth and resilient hardware margins despite FX headwinds. Guidance highlighted demand strength across iPhone and Mac segments.

title: Apple Inc. Q3 2023 Form 10-Q
content: Quarterly results reflected solid operating leverage with gross margin expansion of 80 bps. Management noted normalization of supply chain and stable channel inventories.
